author: m.kalinin
content: I am unable to login to ethereum-magicians via Github (worked well before). The mesage is "You can't log in from that IP address." which doesn't seem to depend on the IP address as same happens with differently geo located IP addresses. Who would be the best person to reach out to?

author: nixo.eth
content: me, let check on this for you

author: nixo.eth
content: should be fixed now - feel free to DM if you still have problems getting in

author: greystroke
content: Total validators now under 1M due to consolidations (mostly via the exit 0x01 then redeposit as 0x02 type validator method as opposed to direct consolidation).
